snippet: The next two days - the N.B.A. trade deadline is Thursday at 3 p.m. - will be a game of high-stakes poker between Dwight Howard and the Orlando Magic, and the Magic and the teams bidding to acquire him.
abstract: The next two days - the N.B.A. trade deadline is Thursday at 3 p.m. - will be a game of high-stakes poker between Dwight Howard and the Orlando Magic, and the Magic and the teams bidding to acquire him.

headline.main: Time Grows Short for Magic to Move Howard
